languages.text: "Когда сокровище Калькасара будет похищено, тайные кладовые его разграблены, а имя — посрамлено, псы ложного Императора узрят Истину. Никто не заступится за них, не ответит на их упования. Лишь преклонившись перед Владыками Имматериума, они смогут выжить".

"Once Calcazar's treasure has been stolen, his secret hoards plundered, and his name shamed, the dogs of the false emperor will see the Truth. No one will protect them. No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."
languages.original_text: "Когда сокровище Калькасара будет похищено, тайные кладовые его разграблены, а имя — посрамлено, псы ложного Императора узрят Истину. Никто не заступится за них, не ответит на их упования. Лишь преклонившись перед Владыками Имматериума, они смогут выжить".

No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: “只要我带走了卡尔卡扎的财宝，夺走了他秘密囤积起来的东西，让他的名声蒙羞，那些虚假尸皇的走狗就会看到真相。他们会明白，没人能保护他们，也没人会理会他们的祈祷。他们只有臣服于亚空间的主人，才能获得活下去的权利。”
languages.original_text: "Once Calcazar's treasure has been stolen, his secret hoards plundered, and his name shamed, the dogs of the false emperor will see the Truth. No one will protect them. No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."

traits.locale_text: “只要我带走了卡尔卡扎的财宝，夺走了他秘密囤积起来的东西，让他的名声蒙羞，那些虚假尸皇的走狗就会看到真相。他们会明白，没人能保护他们，也没人会理会他们的祈祷。他们只有臣服于亚空间的主人，才能获得活下去的权利。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: « Une fois que le trésor de Calcazar aura été volé, ses réserves secrètes pillées et son nom déshonoré, les chiens du faux Empereur verront la vérité. Personne ne les protégera. Personne n'entendra leurs suppliques. S'ils veulent gagner le droit de vivre, ils devront s'incliner devant les maîtres de l'Immaterium. »
languages.original_text: "Once Calcazar's treasure has been stolen, his secret hoards plundered, and his name shamed, the dogs of the false emperor will see the Truth. No one will protect them. No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois que le trésor de Calcazar aura été volé, ses réserves secrètes pillées et son nom déshonoré, les chiens du faux Empereur verront la vérité. Personne ne les protégera. Personne n'entendra leurs suppliques. S'ils veulent gagner le droit de vivre, ils devront s'incliner devant les maîtres de l'Immaterium. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: 「ひとたびカルカサルの宝が盗まれ、秘密の宝庫が略奪され、奴の名が穢されてしまえば、偽りの皇帝の犬どもは真実を知るだろう。誰も彼らを守らない。誰も彼らの嘆願に耳を貸さない。非物質世界の主人たちに屈服することによってのみ、彼らは生きる権利を得るのだ」
languages.original_text: "Once Calcazar's treasure has been stolen, his secret hoards plundered, and his name shamed, the dogs of the false emperor will see the Truth. No one will protect them. No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとたびカルカサルの宝が盗まれ、秘密の宝庫が略奪され、奴の名が穢されてしまえば、偽りの皇帝の犬どもは真実を知るだろう。誰も彼らを守らない。誰も彼らの嘆願に耳を貸さない。非物質世界の主人たちに屈服することによってのみ、彼らは生きる権利を得るのだ」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: «Cuando hayamos robado el tesoro de Calcazar, saqueado sus tesoros secretos y avergonzado su nombre, los perros del falso emperador verán la Verdad. Nadie les protegerá. Nadie atenderá a sus plegarias. Solo podrán ganarse el derecho a vivir arrodillándose ante los amos del Inmaterio».
languages.original_text: "Once Calcazar's treasure has been stolen, his secret hoards plundered, and his name shamed, the dogs of the false emperor will see the Truth. No one will protect them. No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando hayamos robado el tesoro de Calcazar, saqueado sus tesoros secretos y avergonzado su nombre, los perros del falso emperador verán la Verdad. Nadie les protegerá. Nadie atenderá a sus plegarias. Solo podrán ganarse el derecho a vivir arrodillándose ante los amos del Inmaterio».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Nachdem Calcazars Schatz gestohlen wurde, seine geheimen Verstecke geplündert, sein Name entehrt, werden die Hunde des falschen Imperators die Wahrheit erkennen. Niemand wird sie beschützen. Niemand wird ihr Flehen erhören. Nur, indem sie sich vor den Meistern des Immateriums verneigen, können sie das Recht verdienen, weiterzuleben."
languages.original_text: "Once Calcazar's treasure has been stolen, his secret hoards plundered, and his name shamed, the dogs of the false emperor will see the Truth. No one will protect them. No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem Calcazars Schatz gestohlen wurde, seine geheimen Verstecke geplündert, sein Name entehrt, werden die Hunde des falschen Imperators die Wahrheit erkennen. Niemand wird sie beschützen. Niemand wird ihr Flehen erhören. Nur, indem sie sich vor den Meistern des Immateriums verneigen, können sie das Recht verdienen, weiterzuleben."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Calcazar'ın hazinesi çalınıp gizli zulaları yağmalandıktan ve adına leke sürüldükten sonra sahte imparatorun itleri, Hakikat'i görecek. Onları koruyacak kimse olmayacak. Yakarışlarını kimse duymayacak. Yaşama hakkını yalnızca ve yalnızca Tindiyar'ın efendilerine boyun eğerek elde edebilecekler."
languages.original_text: "Once Calcazar's treasure has been stolen, his secret hoards plundered, and his name shamed, the dogs of the false emperor will see the Truth. No one will protect them. No one will heed their pleas. Only by bowing to the masters of the Immaterium will they earn the right to live."
